Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Gen AI gave me the answers (mastery teaching) and told me why it was wrong, what I had to do, and how I was to do it.

I was able to look out for these errors in the future.
